total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern of the number 1 in the input grid.
Q2: Determine the size of the output grid based on the pattern identified in Q1.
Q3: Identify the positions of the number 1 in the output grid based on the pattern identified in Q1.
Q4: Fill in the number 1 in the positions identified in Q3 in the output grid.
Q5: Fill in the remaining positions in the output grid with the number 0.
